div.div: District Teacher of the Year, Tanya Peckham

img.alt: State Teacher of the Year Finalist

h3.a: State Teacher of the Year Finalist

div.p: State Superintendent of Education Molly Spearman surprised Wilder Elementary teacher Tanya Peckham, today with news that she has been selected as one of five finalists for the South Carolina Teacher of the Year award. Superintendent […]

Congratulations to Andrea Clark, an International Baccalaureate Full Diploma Candidate from Sumter High School, for being named a National Merit Finalist! This academically talented high school student will move on to compete for one of 7,500 […]

div.div: Sumter School District, 1345 Wilson Hall Road, Sumter, SC 29150 | Phone: (803)469-6900 | Fax: (803)469-3769

Sumter School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, disability, or age in admission to, treatment in, or employment in its programs and activities. For inquiries regarding the policy, contact the Assistant Superintendent of Human Resources or the Director of Specialized Programs, Sumter School District, 1345 Wilson Hall Road, Sumter, SC 29150 or call 803-469-6900.
